profile.description: I'm a developer passionate about developing Full Stack applications with free and open source technologies from Colombia with experience in the design, development, analysis and implementation of monolithic and client-server applications. With knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, relational and non-relational databases; SonarQube, Docker, CI / CD (GitLab) using agile methodologies.

footer.quote: Do you want to talk to me?

backend-clean-architecture-nodejs.description: This architecture is an extensive investigation, from my experience dealing with a poorly structured node.js project, bad patterns, and countless hours of code refactoring and moving things from one place to another.

monolito-react-nodejs.description: Implementation of web application with client server architecture with the functionality of merge both projects when compiling in order to deploy a monolithic app.

keycloak-demo-react.description: Demo for React and Keycloak SSO integration.

rijndael-nodejs.description: Implementation of the rijndael encryption algorithm.

frontend-clean-architecture-reactjs.description: This is a clean frontend architecture project.

cra-template.description: This is the base template that i usually use when i work with React.
